Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: an advertisement for the AllTrails app, which provides information on nearby trails for various outdoor activities such as hiking, biking, and skiing. The app offers features such as verified trails, offline maps, and a global community of adventurers. AllTrails+ membership includes additional planning features and a portion of the fee goes towards protecting the environment. The text does not provide specific information on how to use the AllTrails API.
